ID: CJ7PZKC_00
From: Sreeraj Prakasam <Sreeraj.Prakasam@chalhoub.com>
To: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com>
CC: Nadege Duhamelbacar <Nadege.duhamel@chalhoub.com>; Kawttar Nassik <Kawttar.Nassik@chalhoub.com>; Sajumon Shanmughan <Sajumon.Shanmughan@chalhoub.com>; Shibu Janardhanan <Shibu.Janardhanan@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-01-13 14:39
Subject: Insurance claim - Rainwater leak - Versace Young, TDM
--------------------------------------------------
Dear Hagop,

 

Please find attached required documents for the damages occurred in Versace Young, Dubai Mall, due to the recent rainfall.

Attached files :- ( Site Images, Mall incident report , FM – incident report, Rectification proposals )

 

Date of incident : 03/01/2025

 

I am mentioning further details of the attached proposals and associated scope: 

 

Cost comparison for “Supply of 12 busted ceiling lights” :

*	Huda Lighting                   - AED 6625.50/- (recommended)
*	Jesr                                    - AED 7271.25/-

 

Cost comparison for “Supply of 1 exit light – down arrow” :

*	Jesr                                    - AED 299.25/- (recommended)
*	Al Mas                               - AED 320/-

 

Cost comparison for “Shop front damaged gypsum ceiling replacement”
